subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal became the first player to win five straight Monte Carlo Masters titles by beating Novak Djokovic, 6-3, 2-6, 6-1, on Sunday. Nadal extended his winning streak at Monte Carlo to 27 matches and won his 21st straight victory on clay since losing to Juan Carlos Ferrero in the second round of the Rome Masters in May 2008.
